name: Polly The Frog 2: Island Hopper
description:
***DOWNLOAD FOR BEST EXPERIENCE***

Polly The Frog 2: Island Hopper is here! In this sequel to the first game, Polly finds himself stranded on a tropical island after jumping onto a boat in an attempt to eat a fly! You must help Polly find a plane to fly home. Be careful, though, as this tropical island is full of danger! Make sure to collect the Sea Shell hidden in each level. Something special might happen if you collect them all... Can you help Polly return home?
